workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.37589224219963213 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.18528145410531 --weight-decay 0.0008163808889309009 --lr 7.522516945820178e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 101617 --max-lr 0.0007509056660593562 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.09376434535086431 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.055811102299290385 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
